channel.title: Vengeance Crashes Client
channel.description: If a player uses the Vengeance spell on lunar spellbook their client crashes. How would I go about fixing this? I couldn't find the vengeance spell server side in client class. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Vengeance Crashes Client
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:7, topic:317587”][quote author=runescapepkserver link=topic=414099.msg3049408#msg3049408 date=1259990345]
Yes, problem is all I can find is the give-venge emote. Not the original venge emote. Maybe it’s not in there? Anyone wan’t to give me it? or a different solution.
EDIT: Don’t need venge emote I need the entire code for venge.
FIXED: Changed emote in clickingmost class. Thanks for the feedback anyways guys.
[/quote]well I think that venge other and venge is in differnet locations one should be in client.java, and the other should be in clickingmost, correct me if im wrong[/quote]Inb4 delete your post fucktard

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance Crashes Client
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

runescapepkserver:

Hmm, alright. So they’res no possible way it’s server-sided? And also, the modifier of the source I’m using told me to change the emote of vengeance server-sided. So Any ideas.

Yeah, that would work. Just change the vengance emote.

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance Crashes Client
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You need a client that has the proper animations, etc, in it for vengance to work. Otherwise the client will throw an error.

Use a client like blurrs client, or something of the sort.

Read full topic
